prompts.title: The Little Robot Who Wanted to Dream
prompts.prompt: In a world where robots follow strict instructions, a tiny robot named R1X wishes to dream like humans. With the help of a curious child, R1X embarks on an adventure to discover what dreams are and whether a robot can have them too.

prompts.title: The Lost Star and the Brave Little Owl
prompts.prompt: One night, a small star falls from the sky and lands in the forest. A brave little owl named Oliver decides to help the star find its way back home, facing many challenges along the way.

prompts.title: Luna and the Talking Paintbrush
prompts.prompt: Luna, a young girl who loves to paint, discovers a magical paintbrush that brings her drawings to life. But when her paintings start behaving in unexpected ways, she must learn how to control the magic before it gets out of hand.

prompts.title: The Kingdom of Forgotten Colors
prompts.prompt: A young prince wakes up one day to find that all the colors in his kingdom have disappeared. With the help of a clever fox, he sets off on a quest to bring them back and uncover the mystery behind the color thief.

prompts.title: Captain Seashell and the Treasure of Friendship
prompts.prompt: A young pirate named Captain Seashell sets sail in search of a legendary treasure. Along the way, she learns that the greatest treasure of all might not be gold and jewels, but the friends she makes on her journey.

prompts.title: Max and the Giggle Monster
prompts.prompt: Max, a shy boy who rarely laughs, meets a mischievous monster who can’t stop giggling. Together, they go on an adventure to find the funniest thing in the world, and along the way, Max learns how to embrace joy and laughter.

prompts.title: The Cloud Who Wanted to Dance
prompts.prompt: Nimbus, a fluffy white cloud, dreams of dancing like the wind. But clouds are supposed to float, not dance! With the help of the wind and a few birds, Nimbus sets out to prove that even clouds can follow their dreams.

prompts.title: The Secret Library of Whispering Books
prompts.prompt: Emma discovers a hidden library where books whisper their stories only to those who truly listen. When the library is threatened with closure, Emma must find a way to save it and share its magic with the world.

prompts.title: The Tiny Turtle Who Wanted to Fly
prompts.prompt: Toby, a tiny turtle, watches the birds and dreams of soaring through the sky. With the help of some unexpected friends, he learns that there are many ways to fly—sometimes, even without wings.

prompts.title: The Magical Garden of Midnight Wishes
prompts.prompt: Every night, in a secret garden, glowing flowers bloom that grant wishes to those who find them. A young girl named Elara stumbles upon the garden, but when she makes a wish, she learns that every wish comes with a lesson.
